description.english: Defeat the king without destroying any of his catapults

description.english: Defeated the Mechanized Infantry before the tanks fired on your Homebase

description.english: Defeated the Armored Train without destroying any of its wagons

description.english: Defeated the Helicopter after controlling all four of its missile launchers
